name: double-take
description: Double Take is a face detection and recognition hub that integrates multiple detection engines with home automation systems. It lets you review captures, confirm faces, and route events to platforms like Home Assistant.

features.title: Face Detection
features.description: Advanced facial recognition using multiple detection engines for accurate identification

features.title: Home Automation
features.description: Seamless integration with Home Assistant and other smart home platforms for automated responses

features.title: Multiple Engines
features.description: Support for various detection backends including Frigate, DeepStack, and CompreFace

features.title: Review Interface
features.description: Web-based interface to review, confirm, or reject face detection results with training capabilities

features.title: Real-Time
features.description: Process camera feeds in real-time with configurable detection sensitivity and thresholds

features.title: REST API
features.description: Route detection events to external systems with customizable webhooks and API calls

features.title: Training System
features.description: Improve accuracy by training the system with confirmed positive and negative detections

features.title: Camera Integration
features.description: Connect with multiple IP cameras and video sources for comprehensive monitoring coverage
